languages.text: "Ладно бунтов — мордовороты Наместника совсем с цепи сорвались. Через одного таскали на допросы, все искали каких-то разжигателей..."

traits.locale_text: "Ладно бунтов — мордовороты Наместника совсем с цепи сорвались. Через одного таскали на допросы, все искали каких-то разжигателей..."

languages.text: "The riots were one thing, but the Liege's goons were really grinding me down. Grabbing every other sod, interrogating them, looking for 'instigators'..."
languages.original_text: "Ладно бунтов — мордовороты Наместника совсем с цепи сорвались. Через одного таскали на допросы, все искали каких-то разжигателей..."

traits.locale_text: "The riots were one thing, but the Liege's goons were really grinding me down. Grabbing every other sod, interrogating them, looking for 'instigators'..."
"The riots were one thing, but the Liege's goons were really grinding me down. Grabbing every other sod, interrogating them, looking for 'instigators'..."
"The riots were one thing, but the Liege's goons were really grinding me down. Grabbing every other sod, interrogating them, looking for 'instigators'..."
"The riots were one thing, but the Liege's goons were really grinding me down. Grabbing every other sod, interrogating them, looking for 'instigators'..."
"The riots were one thing, but the Liege's goons were really grinding me down. Grabbing every other sod, interrogating them, looking for 'instigators'..."

languages.text: 「暴動もそうだけど、領主の手下たちが本当に私を追い詰めていた。一人おきに誰かを捕まえて尋問しては、『扇動者』を探していた…」
languages.original_text: "The riots were one thing, but the Liege's goons were really grinding me down. Grabbing every other sod, interrogating them, looking for 'instigators'..."

traits.locale_text: 「暴動もそうだけど、領主の手下たちが本当に私を追い詰めていた。一人おきに誰かを捕まえて尋問しては、『扇動者』を探していた…」

languages.text: « Les émeutes, c'était une chose, mais ce qui me démoralisait le plus, c'était les sbires du suzerain. Ils attrapaient un type au hasard, l'interrogeaient pour voir si c'était un "instigateur"... »
languages.original_text: "The riots were one thing, but the Liege's goons were really grinding me down. Grabbing every other sod, interrogating them, looking for 'instigators'..."

traits.locale_text: « Les émeutes, c'était une chose, mais ce qui me démoralisait le plus, c'était les sbires du suzerain. Ils attrapaient un type au hasard, l'interrogeaient pour voir si c'était un "instigateur"... »

languages.text: “虽然骚乱相当糟糕，但总督手下那群暴徒才是真的要命。他们见到谁就审讯谁，说要寻找什么‘煽动分子’……”
languages.original_text: "The riots were one thing, but the Liege's goons were really grinding me down. Grabbing every other sod, interrogating them, looking for 'instigators'..."

traits.locale_text: “虽然骚乱相当糟糕，但总督手下那群暴徒才是真的要命。他们见到谁就审讯谁，说要寻找什么‘煽动分子’……”

languages.text: «Las revueltas son una cosa, pero es que los matones del Señor no hay por donde cogerlos... Todo el día trincando a gente por sorpresa, interrogándola, buscando "instigadores"...».
languages.original_text: "The riots were one thing, but the Liege's goons were really grinding me down. Grabbing every other sod, interrogating them, looking for 'instigators'..."

traits.locale_text: «Las revueltas son una cosa, pero es que los matones del Señor no hay por donde cogerlos... Todo el día trincando a gente por sorpresa, interrogándola, buscando "instigadores"...».

languages.text: "Die Aufstände waren eine Sache, aber die Schläger des Lehnsherrn geben mir den Rest. Sie greifen sich einfach Leute heraus, verhören sie, suchen nach 'Aufhetzern' ..."
languages.original_text: "The riots were one thing, but the Liege's goons were really grinding me down. Grabbing every other sod, interrogating them, looking for 'instigators'..."

traits.locale_text: "Die Aufstände waren eine Sache, aber die Schläger des Lehnsherrn geben mir den Rest. Sie greifen sich einfach Leute heraus, verhören sie, suchen nach 'Aufhetzern' ..."

languages.text: "İsyanlar bir yana, ben asıl Emîr'in dalkavuklarından bıkmıştım. Her istediklerini götürüp sorguluyor, sözde kışkırtıcıları bulmaya çalışıyorlardı..."
languages.original_text: "The riots were one thing, but the Liege's goons were really grinding me down. Grabbing every other sod, interrogating them, looking for 'instigators'..."

traits.locale_text: "İsyanlar bir yana, Emîr’in dalkavukları beni sinir ediyordu. Her bulduklarını götürüp sorguluyor, sözde kışkırtıcıları bulmaya çalışıyorlardı..."
